description: A table of currently linked episodes for the A/R Transactions (ETR). It also contains a line key for where in the history group this link came from.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The current linked bundled episode ID for the transaction record.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_HX_LINE
columns.description: The line in the history related group corresponding to this link
